controls.name: Establish firewall and router configuration standards
Review firewall and router rule sets at least every six months
Always change vendor-supplied defaults before installing a system on the network
Develop configuration standards for all system components
Demonstrate commitment to integrity and ethical values
Exercise oversight responsibility
Specify suitable objectives
Identify and analyze risks
Policies for information security
Review of the policies for information security
Information security roles and responsibilities
Contact with authorities
Physical devices and systems within the organization are inventoried
Software platforms and applications within the organization are inventoried
The organization’s role in the supply chain is identified and communicated
The organization’s place in critical infrastructure and its sector is identified
Personal data shall be processed lawfully, fairly and in a transparent manner
Consent management for data processing
Personal data shall be adequate, relevant and limited
Retention policy enforcement
Conduct an accurate and thorough assessment of the potential risks and vulnerabilities
Implement security measures sufficient to reduce risks and vulnerabilities
Identify the security official responsible for the development and implementation of the policies
Document the security official’s role and responsibilities

incidents.title: Wire Fraud Attempt
incidents.description: Suspicious wire transfer flagged by system.

incidents.title: ATM Skimming Device Found
incidents.description: Physical skimming device found on ATM.

incidents.title: Unauthorized SWIFT Access
incidents.description: Detected unauthorized access attempt to SWIFT system.

threats.message: Malware signature found on ATM endpoint

auditLogs.details: Changed status from Open to Mitigated
Changed likelihood from Likely to Possible
